Fair Park

Hamilton Fair Park offers a multitude of indoor and outdoor event spaces for corporate events, weddings, parties, receptions, family reunions, concerts, stock-shows, livestock sales and contests, rodeos, and RV sites.

  1. 1 HCHeritageDays-9
  2. 2 HCHeritageDays-594 (Current Item)
  3. 3 HCHeritageDays-627
  4. 4 HCHeritageDays-197

RV Site Rentals  

Fair Park boasts multiple RV sites with water, electricity, and an on-site dump station.  Fair Park offers clean and level sites, pull-thru and back-in spots, and hookups with 30- or 50-amp service.

Jayson Harris Pavilion

Jayson Harris Pavilion is a spacious open-air barn that is equipped with a concession stand and restroom facilities. Included in the rental are 13 tables, 100 chairs, and bleachers.

Pete and Polly Jenkins Livestock Barn

The livestock barn is great for livestock shows and contests, sales, and car and gun shows to name a few.  A drive through with large doors makes access to your event a breeze.

Park and Tractor Pull Area

Great for outside events, fairs, cooks-offs, car shows, tractor pulls and much more.

Rodeo Arena

The arena is available for play-days, rodeos, barrel-races, ropings, cattle tie-outs and more.     

                          

How do I book an RV site or event space?

Contact the Hamilton County Junior Livestock Association Fair Park Committee to book your next event or RV site.

254.644.9849

254.223.0821
